thread.title: Nicole Kidman's clapping technique has confused the internet
thread.title_full: Nicole Kidman's clapping technique has confused the internet

author: Katie Jones
title: Nicole Kidman's clapping technique has confused the internet
text:
Before the memorable ending, when Warren Beatty announced the wrong Best Picture winner , it was Nicole Kidman who briefly stole show at the Oscars 2017. Kidman, who was nominated in the Best Supporting Actress category for her role in Lion , was caught on camera applauding Justin Timberlake after his opening performance at the ceremony. Then, later on in the night, she was filmed clapping again and it became clear that the Hollywood star doesn't clap like the rest of us.
GIF
via GIPHY
Kidman appeared to clap using her palms throughout the Oscars, and the internet couldn't handle it. Twitter users compared her "uncomfortable" clapping style to that of an otter, a seal, The Grinch and yep, Edward Scissorhands.
Nicole Kidman learned to clap from an otter at Sea World.
â€” tad friend (@tadfriend) February 27, 2017
